welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Verde Village, a charming town known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sedona Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sedona Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prescott Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Prescott Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
